website_summaries.verdict: A simple yet highly effective water resistant headlamp with four lighting options condensed into a versatile and comfortable design.
pros: Get full control of lighting your surroundings with four lighting options including white spotlight, white floodlight, spot and flood, and red night vision mode
The head strap is comfortable and breathable
Runs on three AAA batteries, which are included
cons: Some users find the adjustable pivot stiff to change

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LIGHT! GREAT PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and was a life saver. I bought this on deployment because I had a hard time seeing on the flight deck at night and some of the lights were out in berthing so the red light was a selling point for me (because you can't have white light at night on a ship). As a maintenance tech, I work with my hands so the second selling feature was the headband for hands free use. Lights are bright and has good battery life. Stock up on batteries (AAA) because you will be using this ALL the time once you see the usefulness and functionality of this piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good light, very poor hinge.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is inexpensive and yes, the light is good. However, the hinge is lousy. The hinge only allows three light positions, it makes a loud noise moving from position to position, and easily moves back to the straight ahead position with little encouragement. If you only plan on using a headlamp in the forward position, then by all means this is for you. If you want to use it in other positions, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Needs a slight redesign to prevent glare on eyebrows, but, overall a good value
customer_reviews.text: Good headlamp for the price. I wouldn't make this my go-to headlamp but for the price these are excellent backups. This is a very good value for a bright headlamp with red light feature. Pros: red light for at night, ability to dim on most settings, price for the lumens Cons: spot function isn't as good as my black diamond spot headlamp (not as pricey though), the way its designed I have to wear it extremely high on my forehead to not get a glare/light on my eyebrows which is distracting at night.
customer_reviews.author: knotReally

customer_reviews.title: Following the adage "you get what you pay for". ...
customer_reviews.text: Following the adage "you get what you pay for". The headlamp does swivel downward, but the detents are so stiff that you cannot do it one-handed. The real killer on this product is that the edge of the lens extends past the body, and because it's made of clear plastic, results in your being partially blinded by the light. Other models inset the lens in a colored plastic body which protects your vision.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Compact, light-weight, useful lighting options, highly visible color and headband.
customer_reviews.text: Multi-featured headlamp looks like it will work well for my lightweight backpacking and camping needs. Good value compared to REI brands with similar features. Red mode is much less intrusive when bunking with others or wanting to remain discrete in the wilderness. Bright white light on high mode with convenient low-power mode to conserve battery life. Time will tell if durability is up to par, but I've found that even the more pricey outdoor-store models can have issues holding up. Don't beat it against rocks or drop it in a lake and you should be fine. Bright green colored body and headband will help not forgetting it at the last campsite - leave no trace!
customer_reviews.author: FrugalShopper

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent headlamp.
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this for work. It adjusts to fit nicely around this hardhat. It provides just enough light without blinding those who might be standing in front of you. He also rides his bike home at night, so it's definitely an essential item for him. For the length of time he needs to use it, I feel the battery life is fairly good. I don't think you could ask much more out of batteries when you are using the light for many hours at a time on an almost daily basis. You can always get rechargeable batteries if you need to.
customer_reviews.author: SilverWings

customer_reviews.title: A Joke
customer_reviews.text: Not only does the switch work intermittently, the glare from the bezel is ridiculous. Using the bright setting casts a horrible glare into the eyes making it near impossible to see. Did the person who designed this ever try it out? I think not. Lame...
customer_reviews.author: Erok Magnag

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Small, light, comfortable, bright light, low power consumption, rugged.
customer_reviews.text: Super bright and light weight. I am an (old) DYI car repair guy. When under the car, I never had enough light. Drop lights were too bulky, the cord got in the way of the creeper wheels and the light was never shining where it was needed. This light is not only bright, it is small and comfortable and is always pointing right where I need it to point. I use NiMH rechargeable batteries. One set will last all day on a charge. I have four of these. I keep on in my car, one in the garage and a couple in the house.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jacoby

customer_reviews.title: and it feels like you're going to break it each time you try ...
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, quite disappointing compared to older Energizer products, specifically with respect to the tilt function. My previous one (which still works, and sells for less than this newer brighter version) allowed you to tilt the headlamp at any angle within the range and it would stay exactly where you set it. This version locks into specific presets, and it feels like you're going to break it each time you try to adjust it. I had no desire to have it break on me 2 months down the road, so I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Haiku Review

customer_reviews.title: Super bright but bad glare if you wear glasses
customer_reviews.text: The light on two of the three light modes on this product are crazily bright–I've used it as a hand-held option several times since getting it. These two modes, however are woefully ineffective for me as I wear glasses and these two bright modes create a blinding glare in my lenses. The third light mode, which is a flood light, works very well. While this one doesn't create as far-reaching a light, it does light up a good-sized area on a pitch-black morning. I cannot speak to the fourth mode as I never use the blinking red lights.
customer_reviews.author: zippyrich

customer_reviews.title: Good versatile LED headlamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little headlamp. I have several of them -- one for work, one for my search and rescue pack, one hangs on a hook by the door at home for going out at night. Has a good variety of light options from really bright, to somewhat bright, spot or flood, to red for going up trails at night without losing night vision as much. Fairly easy to operate without having to look at it to figure out what button is what (only one button). So far (a few months) they are holding up well too, even being thrown in backpacks and toolbags and such.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headlamp
customer_reviews.text: The headlamp is brighter than the last one I got, which I really like. It probably uses up batteries faster, though. The best feature is that once you've kept the light on one of the settings, you don't have to scroll through all of the settings to turn it off. This is particularly useful when you are using the red light to not wake you up, mess up your night vision, or wake your spouse. When you are done, push the button and it turns off. My old headlamp required me to scroll through several bright white settings to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kroeker

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use when I arrive at motorcycle trackdays early in the morning and want to unload my trailer. They get the job done. I recently had to do some work in my attic laying POE cable for security system and they came in handy. I didn't have to use the brightest light to see. I like that there are at least 3/4 different modes. For the price, I can complain.
customer_reviews.author: LasandSta

customer_reviews.title: Love this light!!! Have 2.
customer_reviews.text: I love this light so much I bought a 2nd one for using in the car. I use it every night for reading in bed because my husband can't sleep with a white light on. I can read perfectly with the red. I bought the 2nd one so I can read at night in the car while my husband drives. With the red light of course. He can't drive with lights on in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: This is indispensable
customer_reviews.text: I have a boat, and my boat has a lot of dark nooks and crannies that contain really important bits. This lighted headband is very bright, and when it first turns on it turns on red, which is absolutely the right thing when you're on a boat and you need your night vision. I like how I can adjust the angle, and I like how it's not too big so I can angle it and still stick my head down into the bilge without it hitting anything.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for a few hours but now it won't hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a few hours but now it won't hold a light level. It seems every move you make the intensity adjusts, which is annoying. New batteries fixes the problem for about ten minutes before it fades again. Given I have an five-year-old LED flashlight that still has the "included" batteries installed and it still holds the same bright intensity, this is just embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's plastic and feels sturdy. This would be really handy for walking the ...
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my teenager who had requested one of these. This particular model is very bright, has a lower mode as well, and also has a red-light "night" mode. It does come with Energizer-brand batteries, so you don't have to buy them separately. It's plastic and feels sturdy. This would be really handy for walking the dog in the evening, taking the trash out at night, etc. - any time when it would be a little awkward or inconvenient to hold a flashlight. Of course, it would work great for camping or hiking as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Switches go bad
customer_reviews.text: After time the switches go bad and it is difficult to turn them off and on. Funny how if you have something made in the 60s or 70s the switches seem to still work but modern day stuff is just very cheap. But the light works well when it is on and you can work with it. I use it on my hard hat working construction in dark places.
customer_reviews.author: khopper540

customer_reviews.title: The only bad thing I can say was that it got pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is BRIGHT" This is the second headlamp by Energizer I've had. The last one is actually still going strong after almost 20 years (No joke), but the band has just stretched out too much with time. The only bad thing I can say was that it got pretty hot after 30-40 minutes of it being on continuously. I had it dangling from inside a closed tent. Don't think that had anything to do with it but you never know. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glare into face is blinding
customer_reviews.text: I trust the energizer brand to do better. This light is powerful and bright, but completely unfunctional due to glare directly into the face. I've had at least 4 other headlamps in he past 2 years and none have this simple design flaw that makes it a good flashlight but a terrible hands free headlamp.
customer_reviews.author: Myriah C Pahl

customer_reviews.title: Very "Handy"
customer_reviews.text: This headlamp flashlight has become a vital part of my toolset, as I work in a some hard to see and reach places. For it to be handsfree, it's a very handy tool to have. A lot of times I need my hands to move things out the way for a better view, or to use other tools. Also, I love how it tilts forward, so I don't have to move my head to see certain angles.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Eats up batteries
customer_reviews.text: Headlamp is not too bad, just wished it wouldn't go through batteries so quickly. I have it on the lowest setting to get the most time out of the batteries. I think Energizer wants you to buy more of their batteries.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for a Great Light
customer_reviews.text: Purchased so that my wife has good lighting when she goes jogging in the mornings before the sun is up. She loves this headlight. Is very bright, for the price the brightest headlight we could find. Have even seen some of the similar headlights in big box stores but they were only 200 lumens instead of 225. With fresh batteries this light is amazing. Great Value.
customer_reviews.author: R Haws

customer_reviews.title: Good headlamp
customer_reviews.text: Super bright. Red light mode is great for areas with lots of bugs (so they don't follow your light into your tent at night). Some people complained of a slight glare in their eyes from it. I took a dark nail polish color and painted a strip on the very bottom of the light to avoid eye glare. The band fit well and didn't bother my head. For the price, this is great.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: BEST VALUE HEADLAMP SUPER BRIGHT SUPER CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: GREAT HEAD LAMP SUPER BRIGHT 3 LIGHT MODES PLUS RED LIGHT FOR STEALTH MODE ADJUSTABLE HEAD BAND FITS SNUG AND COMFY LIGHT HAS ADJUSTABLE BEAM DIRECTION UP AND DOWN FOR BETTER BEAM FOCUS ACCURACY 3 AAA BATS YOU CHOOSE LIFE SPAN BUT COMES WITH 3 ENEGIZER BATS. GREAT PRODUCT THUMBS UP FROM ME
customer_reviews.author: abujungo

customer_reviews.title: Great Headlamp
customer_reviews.text: Was so bright, with new batteries, that my camping companions complained it was blinding them. Had to be cognizant of where I was pointing this light to avoid hitting one of them with the beam. As battery wore down, light was less bright but worked great for me in my personal space. Could not be happier with this light and what a value!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this headlamp pretty much every day for well over a year now and it's been the most consistent thing in my life. It works great, is comfortable enough that I can forget I'm wearing it, and though it lasts a good long time it is easy to replace the batteries. I use rechargeable batteries in it and it's bright enough for me, though it does get brighter with regular AAA batteries. I have the lower lumen red one that is still going great and strong for years but I had needed a second, love this line and if I need another I will have to keep upgrading and go for the grey or yellow one.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why Amazon asks if this is good for working out- not a piece I’d use at the gym and it wouldn’t necessarily be the most comfortable to use when jogging or sprinting outside. However it has been awesome for night hiking, camping and all needs where you need light in dark spaces and free hands like fixing pipes under the sink :(.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to find in the dark
customer_reviews.text: Super bright. We use it for camping and working on the cars. Has a wide field of light making larger area more visible compared to other headlights. I love that the straps are lime green because I’m constantly losing my black one when it blends in with dark surroundings. Would definitely buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: A very versatile headlamp
customer_reviews.text: After 6 power outages between January 1 and early April, of varying lengths, I decided we needed better flashlights. I had used a headlamp in the past, and found another two on Amazon. Best move I’ve made in ages! The next outage was a lengthy one, but with the headlamp I could continue with my chores. I have choices in lighting strength, angle of the flash, and 4 choices of types of flash. It’s a wonderful help during an outage, and, by the way, we haven’t had an outage since early April!
customer_reviews.author: Zoo Lady

customer_reviews.title: Nice headlamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp has Redlight, all beams, spot beam and flood beam. What I like about this model is every kind of mode is dimmable as long as you hold down the power button, except the red light mode. Very bright and adjustable tilt angle. There is some reflection around the lens but I don't mind it. If you're using it for a hard hat or cap it blocks that reflection.
customer_reviews.author: Wankabro

customer_reviews.title: Great Headlamp
customer_reviews.text: Nice price and good quality. I use this around the house, in the garage, in the car all the time for projects, chores, cleaning, etc. Very comfortable, sometimes I forget I have it on my head. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Baka Gaijin

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Damn good light and durable, worked in attics and under house best light ever for your forehead. It even flips up and down for hard spots to see.. very bright but doesn't last long a batterys ... but totally worth buying if you work in the dark alot
customer_reviews.author: Boomhauer

customer_reviews.title: Great.. Good price. Batteries last long.
customer_reviews.text: For the price and function I love it. Not QUITE as bright as my old one that broke but the batteries seem to last way longer. I dunno why I ever had a flashlight after switching to headlamps lol. Only issue I have is too many click button features.. Red light.. one light.. side lights.. high .. low.. I would be happy with BRIGHT BRIGHTER OFF. But I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Headband didnt last 1 night.
customer_reviews.text: Took it to work the same day it arrived and after wearing it for only 1 hour, part the elastic in the headband snapped so it's all wrinkled and out of whack. I've purchased this model before from a big box store and loved it which is why I bought another one. Not sure why this one fell apart. Old stock? 2nd quality? The light itself is good. Will probably buy the next one from a big box store again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and bright
customer_reviews.text: Plenty bright enough to spot the baby cayman in the Amazon for the guide. I like the red light function for reading and around camp at night so I don't lose my night vision. Water resistant and the price is right. I've had several more expensive lights bought at Hiking stores and they didn't hold up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Adventurer

customer_reviews.title: Great For Postal Employees
customer_reviews.text: For the first time Postal Employee, this is a must-have. Purchased this for when I was inefficient and found myself out delivering mail and Amazon packages alike way after dark. It worked great, lights up the mailboxes and the mail in my hands. It tilts a bit, allowing you to aim the light in a direction that works better for you.
customer_reviews.author: V. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Works very well , allows you to use both hands to move around in the dark.
customer_reviews.text: When my crawl space flooded from all the rain , I had to pump it out. It is low and dark in there and trying to move a pump and hold a flashlight at the same time was difficult.This head lamp worked great like a car headlight.I could look around and move the pump and hose with both hands. Life saver for me.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Downes

customer_reviews.title: Functioned well in all aspects
customer_reviews.text: Had my first tent camping trip with this headlamp and really liked it. It is comfortable to wear, the button is easy to find, the light settings are of acceptable brightness and the amber light is perfect. It can be adjusted to the angle of your preference. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: G. Winslow

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to head lamp for 2 reasons. 1. They're very bright 2. They're cheap. I have about 5 of them scattered around my garage and fishing/hunting bags. Long battery life as well. Cant go wrong for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a Ragnar relay to run on trails in the dark. The trails had many tree roots rocks and hazards but I could see just fine. They also were comfortable and stayed put on my head while I ran. These are a must have if you run in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Reliable lighting
customer_reviews.text: We go caving and camping quite often and this Energizer headlamps have been through rough and tumble times. We use them as back ups and have come through often better than our principle lighting gear. Never have had any problems even when they've got wet.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGuest

customer_reviews.title: Many uses
customer_reviews.text: Used it for working in the backyard at night, up in the attic anytime, and helping light the tiny area of small toy circuitry when the light is not quite right. More use than I imagined when first purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E Parr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for hands-free illumination
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this headlamp for auto detailing. It really helps to expose small blemishes and dirty spots in the paint. I had a similar product years ago (also Energizer) and this is much improved. The removable headband is a nice feature, and the battery compartment is easily accessible. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great for hunting and housework
customer_reviews.text: I used this for deer season and around the house. The red light was plenty bright enough to walk to the blind. When the max brightness was used it was enough light for both my dad and I to walk to the blind. Multiple settings have a noticeable difference in brightness and coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: I really use it for reading at my desk because I hate the glares from the ink and pages some of ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this sucker all the time! My family thought I looked goofy, but who is the genius that can see under the bed, outside, under the car, and read at nights? Damn right, it's this guy. I really use it for reading at my desk because I hate the glares from the ink and pages some of my books get. If the light originates at your head, you don't get the glare. Super useful. Cool experiment: If you get em, go out to your lawn at night and stare at it. You'll notice tiny glittering eyes. Those are all the little spiders in your yard. :)
customer_reviews.author: OneOfBlood

customer_reviews.title: The issue is easily remedied with use of electrical tape or duct tape ...
customer_reviews.text: Light throws quite well. But there is a huge flaw to the lens design. Since the whole front of the light is clear plastic, a large amount of glare is thrown down into your face. The issue is easily remedied with use of electrical tape or duct tape to cover the bottom edge of the lens. However, it should not even be a necessity. Also, I find that the lamp body occasionally slips out of the headband. This is due to the design of having the and separate and the lamp body designed to just slip on the band. I have no found a good remedy for this yet, so it only gets 2 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: D.Lamson

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, very bright with several options including red light (nice). Batteries seem to last forever. It's a real life saver when camping off the grid in mind numbing darkness. Also, the wide adjustable head strap is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Trader28

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: The light was very bright and helpful when in dark environments. I used this for camping and the different modes were very useful for walking around. Also, the head of the light was adjustable so I was able to use it when performing exams by shining the light in the direction I needed. The band was comfortable around my head. This is a useful headlight when I need both hands for other tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Bright, lightweight,
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, very bright, baterries last a long time. It has 3 different modes. Red light, bright and dim. I don think i had ever had to use the bright one. The elastic band does not degrade like the other ones. It is light and does not want to ride down your forehead. I am very happy, i highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H.

customer_reviews.title: I've had it a year and a half and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: A year and a half into ownership, and I'm still loving it. The only thing negative I would have to say is that the mechanism by which the headlamp stays up has weakened, so I use a piece of clear packing tape to hold the headlamp up. I love the dimming feature. Makes it so I can use it around the house without waking others up.
customer_reviews.author: AMarshall

customer_reviews.title: Beyond expectation
customer_reviews.text: This headlamp does everything the box said it would do, I just didn't expect it to work so well. the dimming feature is awesome, and I find myself using the red light mode or the flood light mode in the lowest setting the most. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a good affordable headlamp.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good light. If this breaks I'll reorder same head light
customer_reviews.text: works well and it does not have all those 15 clicks to get the light you want. I think it one click for red night light, 1 click for 2 small lights and another click for all 3 white lights. Works great. I use it daily and it's not hard on batteries either.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Good quality headlamp. Nice and bright. I’ve owned dozens of headlamps and the Energizer ones always seem to last the longest. This one is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: mmhanks

customer_reviews.title: Simple operation, well built, great options with wide and spot beams!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lantern for use on my sailboat. The red night vision light is great to have (and plenty bright), and the combination of wide flood and spot beams are perfect for pulling anchor in the dark, working in a tight area (with dimming being a huge plus there as well), and turning the spot on for docking at night if necessary. Very happy with this headlamp. I bought a cheaper headlamp to have as a backup in case this one was lost/broken/etc and it's terrible compared to the Energizer. I should have just bought a second.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable - Light - Reliable with Strong Beam Headlamp
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Already logged 8 hours with same set of batteries while working on my house. (It's a little dimmer now) but the bright focused lens and the bright dispersed lights are very bright. (especially compared to the previous Engergizer versions) This is clearly one of the best reliable head lights in the business and far cheaper and more reliable than other triple its price.
customer_reviews.author: RaphaelRicardo

customer_reviews.title: Great for mailmen.
customer_reviews.text: I have given several of these to letter carriers for the poverty short days in December. I know how tough it is to see the addresses in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: This proved real quick how much better it is than a flashlight
customer_reviews.text: lost electricity in my apt the other day. This proved real quick how much better it is than a flashlight. Now I use a flashlight just to supplement this if needed (and rarely is). Hint make sure you get one for your wife/girlfriend/roommate or you'll be sorry. I use this with Amazon basic rechargeable batteries  and this charger
customer_reviews.author: Retired Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great for reading
customer_reviews.text: I love these for reading in bed. Focused light does not bother bedmate, and gets you a laugh which may lead to other things. Yum yum yum
customer_reviews.author: James H. Agans

customer_reviews.title: Get this if you want a good headlamp without breaking the bank!
customer_reviews.text: Easiest of any headlamp (and i've owned many kinds) to insert and remove batteries. Comes with the needed batteries, lithium and claimed to be non-leaking. Nice bright light and numerous settings, including red, and adequate headband. Low end of price range for good headlamps.
customer_reviews.author: ADAGIO

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs a good headband flashlight.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these great little lights for work and for working around the house, for years now. A must have for the toolbox or winter survival kit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: MY HUSBAND LOVES IT. He uses it when snow-blowing at night.
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my husband for his birthday. HE LOVES IT. Much brighter light than our older energizer headlamps. It's okay that it has pre-set adjustments for the light- that was a critique in the reviews. He says is not an issue. My husband uses this when he needs to do snow-blowing at night. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: General lighting great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price and secondary head lamp. Serves most general purposes. Not bright enough for tracking game though or for distance.
customer_reviews.author: outdoorsman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Headlamp!  I LOVE the dimming option!  So cool!!!
customer_reviews.text: I carry a headlamp at all times in my backpack. I never know when a hotel or even my office building may lose power. Very bright and I LOVE the 'third' light option - - it is almost a 'soft white' light. Incredible. Purchase one - or two, you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: In love with Utah Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Great light!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to hook up my Jeep to my tow rig...very bright. Can see all the small details I need to see.....use it as a pathfinder to gather wood at camp in the woods as well...nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: lorie

customer_reviews.title: my go to camping headlamp
customer_reviews.text: low price, good light... i've been using this more often than my other, more expensive option headlamps.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Self

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this headlamp for the purpose of lighting during camping trips. I have had a few occasions to utilize it and found it a great tool. The light is bright and straight forward to put on and turn on in the dark. Lots of value of the money.
customer_reviews.author: krispea

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping, work, or emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these at Walmart a year ago, I work in a mountain theres no light, and snakes come out so we need head lamps, this is a great durable light I use it from 4 am to 6 or 7am 6 days a week and it never fails, its not as bright as new so that's why I'm buying ordering another one, I HIGHLY recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jose r.

customer_reviews.title: Bright, but usability could be better
customer_reviews.text: Still have to cycle through settings. Do like the ability to dim. Wish red was not the default color when turning it on.
customer_reviews.author: NickSab

customer_reviews.title: great headlamp
customer_reviews.text: This headlamp is amazing! Ive only use it for 2 days so not sure how long the battery will hold when its on high. This makes working in the dark easier. The red light is a plus
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy item to have available.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how often I have used this flashlight. The ease of use and bright light make this an excellent addition to have at hand.
customer_reviews.author: Rider

customer_reviews.title: Headlamp
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has several levels of brightness and a red night light. perfect for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and lots of options
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and lights up the area well. Others in the group wished that they had one similiar to mine. The red night vision mode is very handy at times when you don't want to shine a light in someone's face.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer1

customer_reviews.title: great headlamp for the price
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a camping/caving trip in Oregon. It was super bright (especially in the darkness of the caves) and lasted the whole three days we were gone. I'm a huge fan of the 4 different modes. Definitely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Proffitt

customer_reviews.title: Great headlamp for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick comfortable headband. 3 usable switched outputs - red, bright white and lo white. Angle adjustment clicks into position and stays there. The power switch isn't the easiest to use, but I'm getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to evaluate for night time firefighting in our department. Our firefighters like it! Typically we place headlamps on our wildland helmet with goggles stowed above the headlamp. It was important to be able to locate and operate the button by tactile "feel" through gloves without the need to remove the helmet to operate the light. Beware, this light is brilliantly bright, the ability to dim the light and the red LED lighting option to preserve nigh vision are a plus. Typically, everything on a wildland fire runs on AA batteries, however, personally, I will carry AAA's to use this headlamp. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Ken G.

customer_reviews.title: Best headlamp
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a older version of this model two years ago loved it right up until I dropped it off a cliff hiking it still worked but flickered it was a no brainer to buy the same one again this ones even better
customer_reviews.author: Robert Loder

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, functional. Just a good as a Petzel, won't be wasting $ paying retail at camping stores anymore.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaBoo

customer_reviews.title: Versatile with long battery life
customer_reviews.text: Great to have bright white light or more subtle red light. Used for search and rescue training. Red light is good for visibility without blinding others.
customer_reviews.author: John Nesbitt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item
customer_reviews.text: I've had many of these. Good light quality. Overall good item. I'd recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought several of these to go camping with my children. Very bright and well built. 5yo son had no difficulty using it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable intensity LED headlamp
customer_reviews.text: Great light with adjustable intensity and directional options. LED so the batteries last longer. Easily adjustable headband. I own 2.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: I picked up two of these to replace the lamps I had on my boat. These are such an upgrade it is wild. Great light.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great headlamp
customer_reviews.text: Turned out to be a great headlamp for the price. Very bright. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: thedish

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!
customer_reviews.text: We received the unit as requested. The light is exceptionally bright. The quality of these lights are great. We will test these this weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Doug2

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to walk the dogs in New England at 5AM in the winter. Husband runs his on the highest setting (he's the one who picks up the deposits, while I used the lowest. We both used the tilt feature to ensure the light fell where we wanted it to go. We both wear glasses, and neither one of us noticed any glare. They will get daily, short time usage, but the units are comfortable, adjustable and, since I'm using it in the dark, the fashion statement isn't going to be an issue. We are already thinking of other uses for them. These replaced a prior Energizer unit and we appreciate the design improvements. An excellent value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Brightest headlamp
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hiking. These are BRIGHTER than the Black Diamonds and a fraction of the price. All the modes are awesome as well. Replaced my other headlamps with these Energizers.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler C

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is such a deal for 12 bucks. Much more practical (and dorky) than holding a flash light. Light is sufficiently bright and you can adjust the angle accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: NHGUY

customer_reviews.title: Good headlamp. Only downside is the fact it uses ...
customer_reviews.text: Good headlamp. Only downside is the fact it uses so many AAA batteries. I prefer the rechargeable headlamps but when compared I found the headlamps that use batteries tend to last longer and stay brighter than those that are charged.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR ITS PRICE.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect for camping but not recommended for automotive use since it has a limited use. But hey it will get the job done
customer_reviews.author: Seniorito

customer_reviews.title: 3rd one I've purchased.
customer_reviews.text: My third purchase. One for me for car emergensy and one each to my son and grandson that lots of walking after dark.
customer_reviews.author: DLDC

customer_reviews.title: Like another product I recently reviewed
customer_reviews.text: This may have also been a lightning deal or an item I was able to get an additional promotional credit. Like another product I recently reviewed, it works great and has high output. One can’t ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: 2cups

customer_reviews.title: Great headlamp
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I use it around the house and for trimming our dog's nails. Can be extremely bright (in my opinion, but can also be adjusted)
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Torres

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Was defective, light didn’t turn on. Replaced battery still didn’t work. Messed around with the power button and it turned out that was the problem. I ended up just buying a new one. This one just Sits in a junk box now
customer_reviews.author: nathaniel redden

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. Love these lights. Makes working in dark places so much better.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Solid product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome light for the price! Using this for work when I gotta get in attics and it definitely has enough lumens for clear visibility in any situation. Recommend to anyone looking for an affordable/reliable headlamp.
customer_reviews.author: Jiggin_pro

customer_reviews.title: Super bright! Great battery life!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my light!! It's super bright and the batteries stay bright for a week. I use it every night multiple times to take my dogs for walks and pick up after them. I only wish they made rechargeable batteries that went along with it. 1.2v rechargeables don't work for it. They have to be 1.5v rechargeables, which are hard to find and very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Garnita Backus

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Took almost 2 months to get it but it does its iob
customer_reviews.author: Jeffcourt

customer_reviews.title: Should be a standard household item.
customer_reviews.text: My pest control guy recommended this to look for eggs n tight places. I use it for wood carving. This morning I used to get a sandspur sticker out of my foot. I also intend to use it to check food in my convection oven.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Battery life and brightness are great. I love the band too. It holds the lamp well. Problem is with the lamp quality. If I extremely flimsy. When you try to adjust it, it opens and the batteries fall out. I would not recommend this since it is not usable.
customer_reviews.author: MM
